keyword: how many calories in orange chicken
title: How Many Calories in Orange Chicken?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in orange chicken per typical serving, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for healthier options.
h1: How Many Calories in Orange Chicken?
assumptions: Restaurant-style (e.g., similar to fast-food chains); breaded, fried chicken pieces in sweet orange sauce; ~240g per serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, recipe, portion size, frying method, and sauce amount. Check menus or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard serving of orange chicken contains about 490 kcal, with high carbs from the sauce.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Baked instead of fried (reduces oil absorption)

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of orange chicken?
faqs.a: Approximately 490 kcal for a typical restaurant serving.

faqs.q: Is orange chicken high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, about 51g carbs per serving, mostly from the sugary sauce.

faqs.q: How much protein in orange chicken?
faqs.a: Around 22g protein per serving from the chicken.

faqs.q: Why is orange chicken so high in sodium?
faqs.a: Due to soy sauce and seasonings; ~820mg per serving.

faqs.q: Can I make orange chicken lower in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, bake the chicken and reduce sauce for ~340-390 kcal per serving.
